overview: The Beatles present their 1970 chart-topping album "Let It Be" in sweeping new Special Editions, as you’ve never heard it before, with New Mixes in Stereo, 5.1 Surround, and Dolby Atmos by producer Giles Martin and engineer Sam Okell.  Expanded with Never Before Released Session Recordings, Demos, Rehearsals & Studio Jams, and the Previously Unreleased 1969 Get Back LP Mix by Glyn Johns.
tagline: The Beatles "Let It Be" 50th Anniversary Blu Ray.
title: The Beatles: Let It Be
